game.name: Choose Your Own Alternative
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A text-based adventure about exorcising your friend’s Inner Demon. Analyse objects filled with memories, uncover the reason of her possession, talk with her and figure out which object should be chosen for the sacrifice. Save your friend not matter the cost.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A text-based adventure about exorcising your friend’s Inner Demon. Analyse objects filled with memories, uncover the reason of her possession, talk with her and figure out which object should be chosen for the sacrifice. Save your friend not matter the cost.
